content:
Detailed Guidelines on DGFT & Foreign Trade Services

DGFT Services - 
Advisory on policies, procedures, and compliance under Foreign Trade Policy (FTP).
Support in applying for Authorisations, Incentives, EPCG, Advance Authorisation, MEIS/SEIS, RoDTEP, ROSCTL etc.
Representation and liaison with DGFT Regional Offices for clarifications, extensions, and policy reliefs.
